title: How-to check Medium Rare on a Steak without a thermometer
description:
Medium Rare steak without a Thermometer |  Having a steak at that perfect medium rare temp can be difficult, even more so when you don't have a thermometer handy. This quick tip will help you remove the guess work.

Cook that steak to the perfect temp with these products:

Pro 90

Deluxe Grill Box 90

asset.title: How-to check Medium Rare on a Steak without a ther
asset.description:
Medium Rare steak without a Thermometer |  Having a steak at that perfect medium rare temp can be difficult, even more so when you don't have a thermometer handy. This quick tip will help you remove the guess work.

Cook that steak to the perfect temp with these products:

Pro 90:  http://www.campchef.com/pro-90-deluxe-three-burner-stove.html

Deluxe Grill Box 90: http://www.campchef.com/deluxe-bbq-grill-box-90-accessory.html

Be sure and subscribe for more Quick Tips, Recipes, and more.
asset.author: Camp Chef

transcripts: So you got a grill full of steaks and you want to know what medium rare is and you don't have a thermometer. Use your finger and push down on the meat when it's less cooked, It will stay indented. As it cooks more it springs back. That's how you do it without a thermometer.
